plays.text: Goal scored by Steve Konowalchuk assisted by Jeff Halpern and Mike Grier
Penalty to Ken Klee 2 minutes for Holding the Stick John Madden
Penalty to Scott Niedermayer 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Jason Doig
Penalty to Peter Bondra 2 minutes for Tripping Joe Nieuwendyk
Penalty to John Madden 2 minutes for Hooking Jaromir Jagr
Goal scored by Peter Bondra assisted by Kip Miller and Michael Nylander
Penalty to John Madden 2 minutes for Interference Calle Johansson
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Kip Miller
Penalty to Steve Konowalchuk 2 minutes for Crosschecking John Madden
Goal scored by Jamie Langenbrunner assisted by Patrik Elias and Brian Rafalski
Penalty to Brendan Witt 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Sergei Brylin assisted by Brian Rafalski and Patrik Elias
